website_summaries.verdict: This set of cornhole bags is available in a range of colors and stands up to the test of time, making them a solid purchase.
pros: Set of 8 bags comes in a multitude of colors
These bags are a good weight that make them easy to throw
Quality stitching ensures durability, even after many uses
Material is fade-resistant, so bags look new even after being exposed to the sun
cons: These are not meant to be left outdoors when not in use

customer_reviews.title: half star
customer_reviews.text: One bag split down the middle after 3-4 hours of use. I think I'll try the other synthetic ones and feed these to the birds. $26 lesson learned. UPDATE: I bought another set of bags from another vendor and tried to sew the rip and use this set as a back up set. Sure enough, another bag busted open just like the first bag. The duck cloth they use is not as thick as the other vendors. These bags should be discontinued. Sorry for all the other people who are experiencing the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not double stitched.
customer_reviews.text: These said they were double stitched and they are not. Some of the threads are hanging loose and one of them looks like it will be apart the first game. If I didn't need them for the weekend I would send them back. Second set I've ordered that said double stitched that are not!
customer_reviews.author: DENISE S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: These are just what we needed. My husband and a friend made the boards to play the game. They came in time for our fourth of July party. They were used all afternoon. Just the right size and made with a cloth that can stand the test of time and are strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: maurylynn

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are well constructed bags. I'm no corn hole expert, but the weight appears to be perfect. Well balanced and easy to throw. They accompany my homemade corn hole set very nicely! Haven't had any problem with the stitching opening up or anything. We used them for many many corn hole games over the 4th of July holiday and they held up great! 2 of them fell in a pool, but they dried quickly and there was no damage done. I purchased thisto keep them all together, and it's the perfect size, so I recommend buying them together if you're looking for a bag as well. Happy Corn-holing!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Frizz

customer_reviews.title: Official size, weight and materials. Great color combination choices, quality corn hole bags.
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me you want the real, quality corn bags that are the regulation size and weight - these are it. Also lots of color options to match up with your boards. I built my own boards and wanted to match colors to my local college team and I was able to pick out the colors I wanted. The only complaint I had is I am a prime member and was hoping to have more color options to purchase through prime and get the two day shipping but oh well. Price was still half the price of many other brands and it only took 3 days to get them from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: A year old and going strong
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bags about a year ago. They have held up extremely well. They have not faded or torn however if you leave them out in moist conditions they will mold. Over all we are very satisfied and have enjoyed lots of hours of play time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cornhole bags for our Patriots set
customer_reviews.text: We considered making our own cornhole bags, but it was more cost effective AND convenient to purchase this set. They work great and have held up wonderfully after 2 months of use. We purchased red and blue to match the New England Patriots logo colors.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, regulation cornhole bags- great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My SIL and I made 2 regulation cornhole boards together for a family get together. I was going to make the bean bags but saw these and decided to order instead. These are made of heavy, thick material, well constructed and regulation size and fill. I shopped many places for regulation cornhole boards and these are, BY FAR, the best for the price! The only reason why I didn’t give it 5 stars is because some of the threads were left uncut and loosely hanging but they did not affect the bags closure. I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, rich colors
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the original bags that came with our regulation size cornhole game. They were a heavy canvas fabric but were not stitched using strong enough thread so they opened at the seams. These are a nice heavyweight duck fabric which I think lends itself better to a strong seam closure. Canvas is so thick that it's durable but you really have to use a heavy thread. Duck is similar to canvas, very durable, heavyweight cotton but it is a little thinner and easier to sew securely closed. The colors are deep and rich. The bags are durable and have already survived a cornhole tournament and several family gatherings. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped first time using them
customer_reviews.text: One of the bags split wide open spilling corn everywhere the very first time using them. It didn't split on any of the seams it split right down the middle of the bad. I could see it possible splitting if it hit a corner or something sharp but it split hitting right in the middle of the board. Too bad, I really liked the look and feel of the bags. Might want to use a material that is a lot stronger than these are. Wasted $30. Should have spent more money and bought a better quality set of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Steelers Fan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Stitching
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to get new bags to play cornhole. After comparing different companies on Amazon we went with these bags due to good reviews. The price was higher than comparable brands but thought the extra price would equal better quality. We are disappointed to report this was not the case. Bags arrived quickly and looked/felt good. However, after about 6 bags or back yard recreational use we already have 2 of the striped bags coming apart at the seems. We will upload some photos and the review post when we get in contact with the seller. Hopefully, this is a one off situation and they will get it corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kregel

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: These cornhole bags are very high quality, made with heavy canvas and filled with corn. They are extremely durable and hold up well to tons of use. The only caution to users is to remember these are filled with corn and therefore shouldn't be left out in the weather where they could get wet. This isn't a flaw of the product, but merely a fact about the composition. I speak from experience as two of my cornhole bags were left out during a rain shower and discovered several days later. The bags had started to smell from the wet corn. Love these things and like the fact they come in many different colors!
customer_reviews.author: David DeMerchant

customer_reviews.title: fade resistant and perfect for throwing
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these corn hole bags because the mice had helped themselves to our other ones. They are made with heavy duty duck material which is long lasting, fade resistant and perfect for throwing. So far they've been great. I wish they'd make me a better corn hole player, but I guess you can't have everything!
customer_reviews.author: SusieT

customer_reviews.title: I got these bags in and thought they were great, and the bags have been good accept for ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these bags in and thought they were great, and the bags have been good accept for one that tore in the side the first time we used it. I have contacted the company 3 times over the last month and have gotten no response. If they would return my emails, I would be completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia w.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cornhole Bags
customer_reviews.text: I used these red and green cornhole bags for my 2nd grader's class holiday party, where I made a "holiday" cornhole game. I used a permanent marker to draw a Santa hat on the red, and an elf hat on the green. The kids loved them. These bags are heavy duty, not cheap at all. The duck cloth material is thick and strong. The bags are filled up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lem S.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Stitching
customer_reviews.text: I just received these two days before anticipated which is awesome. However, 4 out of 8 of my bags had some sort of loose threads hanging out. I haven’t used them yet, but I am concerned about how they’re hold up. They are for a Christmas gift, so I will update later. Thankfully the company does offer replacement bags if they do split. The colors are great, and the material seems thick. They are a good weight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelah

customer_reviews.title: Failed the test throws
customer_reviews.text: Took the brand new bags out for a test run and the red ones started to lose thread and then started to come apart at the top closing seam. On closer examination it looked like the sewing machine was miss threading...on all four. I sewed them back together before they lost any filling and then added backup thread to the blue ones (which appeared to be fine). Have not contacted the seller at this point, but was very disappointed with the quality of the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: B. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Poor "made in China" quality stitching.
customer_reviews.text: One bags stitching busted after about 4 throws when it hit the front edge of the board. This was the internal stitching. Tougher thread should be used. Try some Made in USA thread.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya

customer_reviews.title: These bags are quality
customer_reviews.text: Though I like these bags more than any others I've played with there is one thing I think would improve them. After a while the filling can dry out and the bags can become light. So, I was thinking that it might be nice to add a zipper so a person can refill them if this happens.
customer_reviews.author: J. Q. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a custom set of cornhole boards I built. Have only used once but worked great. Had seen some reviews of bad seems on some other purchases but so far so good. They feel thick/heavy duty in your hand, happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Ross Benedict

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about these corn hole bags? They survived a Raccoon infiltration mission! The quality in which these bags are made were no match for a wandering raccoon that tried to steal one in the night, only to end with disappointment... For him! After the raccoon tried to break one of these bags open he just gave up and left it near a tree with minimal damage. If you are looking for the best quality look no further, i will recommend these to anyone looking for a high quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Cornhole Bags! Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many of the cornhole bags out there that it was not an easy task deciphering the good from the cheap. Weight of the fabric, fill material, stitching and rating and reliability of the seller were all taken into account. These bags are great. Heavy weight, properly filled (16oz) with corn kernels, shipped quickly, priced right and most importantly very pleasant and responsive customer service!!! Yes, I actually got a very fast response to an inquiry! Ordered them for the boards that I made for our Block Party tournament. Got them in plenty of time! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: andre farah

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my existing bags because a squirrel got a hold of them and tore them apart (real corn inside) - Got to use them once - left them out for an hour - and the dang squirrel came back to rip up 2 of them again... not the bags fault... but now I will have to order again... WATCH OUT FOR SQUIRRELS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My better half is very satisfied with them and couldn’t have ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the cornhole boards we made for our wedding coming up this Saturday. We have not actually used them yet but we have tested them out a bit to make sure they did not come apart. My better half is very satisfied with them and couldn’t have given a better review of them. Since they were bought for him I am going to say they are fantastic and I would recommend buying these if you are looking for quality and corn filled over pellet.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: This is the third set that I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set that I have purchased, happy about everything. I do wish that they made more colors available with prime shipping, I'm always waiting until the day before a bbq to order.
customer_reviews.author: Majendra

customer_reviews.title: Good bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are good bags. True filled with corn. For the most part they hold up well. I use them for corporate events so sometimes attendees are a bit hard on them. I buy them all the time. Occasionally one does bust open.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Price and shipping
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the constructions of these bags. I have not used them yet because of the weather. Shipping was super fast; received them 2 days earlier than the initial ship date. The prices was awesome. Will re-post about the durability and quality of material.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time we used this set the one got a large hole in it and all the corn fell out. We could not find anything sharp that it hit. It just got the edge of the board and ripped. After playing a few games another one of the bags tore along the seam and started leaking corn as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Carmoney

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I got the Stars and Stripes edition and the colors are really vibrant. The cloth feels heavy duty. Only time will tell if the stitching holds up but I will update if it fails. So far, really happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: The Magician

customer_reviews.title: Great bags.
customer_reviews.text: We play hardcore bags, and have worn out ones that claimed to be the best. These are filled with real corn, which starts out really smacking on the boards, but has broken down nicely. The cloth is strong and the colors are limitless. These are the preferred bags on our home court. A great buy and we'll probably buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

customer_reviews.title: check the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! We bought a set a few years ago and they lasted great through repeated use. When we needed replacement (we left them out in the rain, they did not rip), I went to "Buy Again" on my amazon page and repurchased same ones. My first set were grey and a pretty teal color, which matches my boards. This second set came and it is grey and sky blue. The color text line says sky blue, but the picture is showing the teal so be careful when ordering. I wish I would have noticed as I loved the teal.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Seams tore open on first use - simply unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: I very infrequently leave reviews of products, but I feel like I have no choice in this instance. Don't buy these bags. I had one open up and start spilling its contents on the very first day they were used. Seriously? I get that they're thrown great distances only to slam into a wooden cornhole board, but still...I feel like they should last more than just a few hours. There's clearly a quality control issue with these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These bags work very well! They were a great price and are sturdy. The material is nice and thick. My only complaint is there’s a white dust that “puffs” out when they hit the board. But It’s not that big of a deal as it just wipes off.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Dreger

customer_reviews.title: Real nice bags, should hold up to many epic games or cornhole!
customer_reviews.text: These seem real nice. They are easy to hold on to and seem to be real durable. Haven’t had them for long enough to really judge how well they hold up but so far they work real well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This will be our third set of bags and probably our last. They are very sturdy and durable. These were highly recommended by a friend and we will suggest them to our friends.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking for corn hole bags and get these. They are exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best quality corn hole bags that I have seen. The colors are bright, the fabric and sewing are strong and high quality. I purchased these in Pink and Orange for our wedding and it's just too bad that one went missing. :-( If you are looking for corn hole bags, get these! Your search is over.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: They seemed heavier than they should be initially (I think the filling was all packed in together in one spot instead of throughout the bags) but once used a few times they worked out great. I would buy again if need be
customer_reviews.text: Bought to go with the corn hole boards I had made for my husband. They seemed heavier than they should be initially (I think the filling was all packed in together in one spot instead of throughout the bags) but once used a few times they worked out great. I would buy again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Good but inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: The bags are great. I use these as my “standard” for my custom sets. My only complaint is sometimes they come with a carry bag and sometimes not. Last time I ordered three sets in one order, no carry bag with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were great replacements for the corn hole set I had
customer_reviews.text: These were great replacements for the corn hole set I had. We got a lot more use out of these (and they still haven't had a seam break) than we did from the originals (which were some other brand.) I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Unfortunately, my son left one out and the squirrels got the corn, but that is hardly a product problem, more like a son’s pack of responsibility problem. These look good, held up well and the dust from the real corn makes all the difference in breaking in new boards!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: this is my first review, and it's based entirely off of the great customer service. one of the bags arrived with a small tear, frustrated but sewed it up. 2 days of moderate playing on brand new routered and sanded board 4 had tears. I sent message about it on a Saturday, got message Monday morning replacement bags on the way, Wednesday they arrived. great customer service and so far the new bags are holding up amazing. again amazing customer service, will update if bags tear apart.
customer_reviews.author: dustin hepp

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal! High Quality Bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very durable and are exactly like the expensive ones at the store. Also the variety of colors make these a pretty cool upgrade if you have the boring red and blue bags that came with the boards.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Go to bags
customer_reviews.text: I make boards for gifts etc and these bags are a solid purchase for the price. They ship fast and have a ton of color options. These holdup well outdoors as well, even wet. Not "pro" quality, but perfect for advanced back yard action.
customer_reviews.author: 3D

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: I have had these bags for a moth now. These have been to multiple camp outs and a company picnic. They have held up well. Stitching is strong and they seem to be holding up real well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great so far. They seem to be a good quality fabric, no rips tears or seam imperfections. We are rough on stuff so I’m sure we will have to buy a new set at some point but so far so good with these. Glad we made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at the quality of these bags. They are inconsistent with regards to weight and size. Makes it difficult to throw with any kind of accuracy. Do not recommend despite all the reviews; not for "serious" cornhole folks.
customer_reviews.author: UppaCreek

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed as I just used these bags for the first time and one already broke open. It didn’t even make it through the first game. I will be call Amazon tomorrow. We play a lot of cornhole and if these bags cannot hold up, I will not ordering these again. Let’s hope it gets taken care of. I will post what they do. Updated: A second bag broke open during the 3rd game. WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Pasco

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy when I reviewed them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my uncle after my dog ate one of his bags that we borrowed. I was a little nervous about the quality when I ordered as he had his previous bags for many years. I was very happy when I reviewed them. They were great quality and the perfect colors for his Pittsburgh Steelers boards. They have been used throughout the summer at multiple family parties and are still holding up great. I will be purchasing these again for our boards when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Break them in before you intend to use them
customer_reviews.text: We received the navy instead of the color we selected but the seller exchanged them quickly and without a huge ordeal. I just wish the colors were more true to picture... great product though but definitely needed to be broken in before use.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Berlingieri

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy, but there's a never-ending supply of dust emanating from these things. This is obviously not due to the very durable fabric, so I'm guessing that all actual corn bags do this as well.
customer_reviews.author: AR Creative

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with these bags. I didn’t think they were going to be as nice as some of the more expensive ones but they work great
customer_reviews.author: Matt Giorgianni

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the corn hole bags that I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the corn hole bags that I purchased. They are brightly colored and very durable. I needed two sets but I wanted to make sure I was happy with the bags before I ordered two of them. I purchased my second set the day after my first ones were delivered.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Quality is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied with my order. 1. We purchased the “teal” color and received more of a royal blue. 2. The stitching has extra length hanging off and doesn’t appear to be very well done. 3. We used these bags at a cookout and after the fourth game one of the black bags came apart at the seam spewing corn everywhere. The quality is very disappointing and we will be looking for bags elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: You will have to replace them eventually because the corn inside breaks down like it should
customer_reviews.text: The highest Quality Cornhole bags out there. Well constructed and long lasting. You will have to replace them eventually because the corn inside breaks down like it should. the material is practically indestructable. We order them for our customers and we have a couple sets for ourselves. never had a bag rip and we have been ordering from this company for years. Great job and supporting a small business is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived dirty with pieces of mulch on them, some hair, and 2 of them were pilling so they had obv been used. Very disappointed. I could have purchased regular cheap ones. I thought these were cool looking. I think the seller will do right by this.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Otter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this one star only because, although the material seems sturdy enough, that's without using them yet, one of the bags was busted at the steam upon arrival, the contents spilling out. I had to refill and sew it back together. All the other seams are a little bit sketchy looking as well but no apparent openings. We will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them kinda late hoping they would arrive by Thanksgiving - success! They got in Wednesday afternoon and we had an awesome time playing cornhole after our Thanksgiving meal. Bags felt perfect, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: John A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: We made a custom corn hole set and needed some bags to match. These are very heavy and filled with real corn instead of synthetic. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chase T.

customer_reviews.title: One bag ruined the whole set
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave these one star is because after about 6 games the stitching had come far enough apart on one of the bags that it was leaking corn. The other bags seem to be holding up fine, but it's pretty frustrating that one couldn't hold up for more than a few games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not official weights, inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Say they are to be 15-16 oz. received 6 that were mid 14 oz, One just over 15 oz, one that was 12 oz, they replaced the 12 oz...... New one was 15.7 and noticeably heavier than Other 7 bags. Not consistent weights. Hard to claim “regulation” when they don’t match or fall within 15-16oz.
customer_reviews.author: whtspar

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: These bags shipped quickly, and are just what we wanted out of cornhole bags, but on the first throw, one of the bags ripped down the middle. It was not along the stitching, but on the face of the fabric. It was quite disappointing. The rest of the bags are fine so far, but we are disappointed with the quality of the fabric on the bag that ripped as we can no longer use it without throwing corn across our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Giles

customer_reviews.title: good quality, have held up to many games of ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality, have held up to many games of corn hole. The stitching is strong and the bags are correct weight for official rules. Easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: K. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with our custom cornhole boards. The material is thick and the stitching on them is great. Would buy again. We haven't used them yet to see how durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jones

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend getting something with a plastic fill just to make ...
customer_reviews.text: A couple of these got some water on them and swelled up hard as a rock. I would recommend getting something with a plastic fill just to make them last longer. Also had some loose threads on the seams when they arrived. Probably going to bust after a while. They worked great before getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Lawhead

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great color combo
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and very well made. We love the Portland Thorns/blazer color combo. Material definitely fades in the sun so being careful with that is important.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hoesly

customer_reviews.title: Good quailty
customer_reviews.text: Needed nes bags for our corn hole sets at church. These work great. The white ones get dirty easy but that's expected. Quality fabric and stitching, haven't had any leaking issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shannanwithana

customer_reviews.title: Great, for the most part. 1 bag ripped, and not water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned these bags for 14 months now. This year, one of my bags started ripping at the seams, multiple times - but thats only one bag of the 8, the other 7 are all holding strong still. These were left out in the rain last week, and now they are hard as a brick - so certainly not water proof which I didnt realize but I can see now that they were never advertsied that way. So overall, great bags. Great weight.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Having monogrammed boards made as a Christmas surprise, these are really good quality, really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: jvs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and well made!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband tailgates every Philadelphia Eagles game with a wonderful group of people. He asked me to get these bags. He is thrilled with the quality especially the regulation size and weight. The group of his tailgating friends are excited! I will have him take some pictures at the next home game! Patty
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B Snyder

customer_reviews.title: As pictured.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my father. He has the tables to play the game and I thought he would enjoy a new patriotic set of bags. He loved them! As pictured and described. Seem quality made, but we did not test them out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sum1

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I made my own cornhole game but, needed the bags and these worked out GREAT! They are a good size and weight. We have used them quite a bit for 2 summers now and they are holding up fine. We do keep them in a bag in the house when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Scavone

customer_reviews.title: Bags
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. My husband loves that they aren’t made with corn. Considering our last bags got eat up by mice.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Keep them totally dry
customer_reviews.text: These were great backs until they got the slightest moisture then they sprouted plants and molded
customer_reviews.author: Hair4alivin

customer_reviews.title: These are the best bags!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we were looking for. Perfect size and weight. Love that they use real corn and not the plastic pellets. These are the bags that everyone wants to use when we play. Very happy with these bags. sturdy material and strong stitching. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Bags break open too easily!
customer_reviews.text: After only three games, the first bag broke open making this set unusable for the family reunion. I tried contact the seller about bags falling apart, but no reply. Originally I was going to give 3 stars, but after the seller did not reply, I downgraded. I purchased bags for another set from this seller in the past that were good, but not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wohlschlegel

customer_reviews.title: Good product. The bags are made of a durable ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The bags are made of a durable material that is perfect with the corn hole set that I built. Great for outdoor use. I only gave 4 out of 5 stars because I do not know how long these bags with last, either from getting dirty or tearing. It has not happened yet, but I bought them a month ago and they are still meeting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect bags. No I'm not a Vikings fan, Green Bay all the way, I just love the color purple :-). These are very good quality bags, that are "regulation" size. They seem to be made with high quality standards and from using them a handful of times I can tell they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Matranga

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've used this set 10 times. Nothing has fallen apart... no seems loosened. They are awesome bags. I would say they haven't lost any color either. Went with classic Red/Navy
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and a great replacement for our other bags. We are happy with the quality and quickness of our order. They seem like they will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Thick good quality, only problem was the hole on my boards are too small for these bags will have to make them bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good quality. Delivered quickly. Won’t find out about durability until I get to use them but they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This game has probably been around forever, but my wife and I were just introduced to it recently, and have decided to construct our own boards. The official bags that we ordered arrived quickly and I we were impressed with the high quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Bags are not 15-16 ounces.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed to unbox these bags. Really wanted legit weighted bags. Sight says 15-16 oz. Only 1 was 15 oz. I got 8 bags. 13.86, 13.30, 13.90, 12.31 and 14.46, 14.53, 14.64, 15.03. I may keep the one set as it is within official limits, but all 4 of the other set are lite and one is 12.3. The ad says 15-16 oz. Sooo disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy fabric and quality construction
customer_reviews.text: The bags I received were exactly as advertised. Good, heavy fabric and quality construction. Seams seem to be sewn very well. All eight bags I received are exactly the same size and weight. They look good and feel good. They are not the 2-sided bags like the professionals use in tournaments but they are perfect for any family and recreational play!
customer_reviews.author: BeachDawg85

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used them a few times and bags ripped. Made poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Shahzaib

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ... perfect corn filled bags ... the way the game should be played!
customer_reviews.author: YahCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Not sewn well
customer_reviews.text: Crap! Used these for the first time this weekend and on the very first toss, this one hit the board and split with the insides spilling out everywhere. Regulation throw, regulation board, nothing out of the ordinary. I stitched it back up so we could keep playing and not even through the first game and ANOTHER bad splits at the seam!!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bags seemed to be great, after barely any use though one bad started to split. It wasn't at a sewn seam it was in the material its self. Informed the seller and they promptly replaced the bag. Nothing wrong with workmanship just a small mishap in the material on that one bag. Seller took care of it and sent a new one. I would buy again should I need another set of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kane Case

customer_reviews.title: Bag tore open during first game
customer_reviews.text: Stitching ripped in first game. Noticed hole in one bag before end of first game. These bags should be more durable than this. Not too satisfied
customer_reviews.author: SlammanDan

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, fabric seems durable. I think we'll be playing with these for years!
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn't feel like making my own so I bought these. Don't be disappointed when you first use them, as with all bags they need to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: They take a good beating before giving out
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing these from this company. They are used at work where A LOT of people use them. They take a good beating before giving out. Great price and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Emmlau17

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but the light color looks dirty
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find teal and navy colored bags for our corn hole game! Love the quality and feel of fabric, it’s a bit sueded. Soft. Wish I thought about the light color showing dirt, though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY & FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered corn hole bags twice from this company. Both times we had a very good experience with shipping! The bags are great quality and last! I see pictures posted of their bags ripping open and we have NEVER had that issue. We’ve used the same bags on our cornhole set multiple times for almost 2 years now. I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, got it just in time for the 4th of July bar-b-q. They survived dozens of games, practically non stop without a hitch. Great quality stitching and fill. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Quality Not There
customer_reviews.text: Two bags broke open on first use. Very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pbjmama

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and we play in dirt with a some rocks
customer_reviews.text: My friend made a corn hole boards and I bought the bags. Very sturdy and we play in dirt with a some rocks. They are holding up very well. I like the weight of the bags. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Get these
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, regulation, there are many to choose from, like always, I choose these.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used these to play hundreds of games so far. They have held up great with no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Used the bags yesterday. Pleased with product. These bags were better than the ones that came with the game.
customer_reviews.author: C

product_meta.title: 8 Standard Corn Filled Regulation Duck Cloth Cornhole Bags
product_meta.description:
Johnson Enterprises 8 Standard Cornhole Bags:



Bags - Handmade using a Heavy Duty 12oz Duck Canvas, Measures 6"x6", and Weigh Between 15-16 Ounces, Exceeding all ACA Regulations.

Bag Material - 12oz Cotton Duck Canvas
Bag Fill - 15oz Premium Whole Kernel Corn
Closure - Heavy Duty Bonded Nylon Upholstery Thread
Closure Type - Internal Double Stitched, with Double Stitched Top Seam
Weight - 15-16oz
1 Year Warranty - We will Replace Our Cornhole Bags in Case of Stitching Failure for One Year. 

We offer 25 Total Colors to Choose from:

19 Solid Colors - Red, Royal, Navy Blue, Orange, Yellow, Purple, Grey, Gold, Baby Blue, Hunter Green, Kelly Green, Charcoal, Scarlet, Brown, Maroon, Black, Turquoise, Pink, & White.
4 Camo Patterns - Green Camo, Blue Camo, Pink Camo, Orange Camo
2 Themed Bags - Stars and Stripes

If the Color Combo you are looking for is not listed above, please choose the "CUSTOM COLORS" option from the drop down and message us the two color options you would like. 

Bags are shipped using expedited shipping and should arrive within 1-3 days after ordering.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :10.43 x 6.97 x 5.63 inches; 7.96 Pounds
 * Date First Available :May 12, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Johnson Enterprises, LLC
 * ASIN :B00XK44GIK

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #8,267 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #17 inCornhole Bags

Closure - Heavy Duty Bonded Nylon Upholstery Thread
Closure Type - Internal Double Stitched, with Double Stitched Top Seam
Weight - 15-16oz
1 Year Warranty - We will Replace Our Cornhole Bags in Case of Stitching Failure for One Year. 

We offer 25 Total Colors to Choose from:

19 Solid Colors - Red, Royal, Navy Blue, Orange, Yellow, Purple, Grey, Gold, Baby Blue, Hunter Green, Kelly Green, Charcoal, Scarlet, Brown, Maroon, Black, Turquoise, Pink, & White.
4 Camo Patterns - Green Camo, Blue Camo, Pink Camo, Orange Camo
2 Themed Bags - Stars and Stripes

If the Color Combo you are looking for is not listed above, please choose the "CUSTOM COLORS" option from the drop down and message us the two color options you would like. 

Bags are shipped using expedited shipping and should arrive within 1-3 days after ordering.
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY – Each Set comes with 8 Regulation Cornhole Bags (4 of each color). Our Bags Measure 6”x6” and are Filled with 15-16 ounces of Whole Kernel Corn as Prescribed by ACA Regulations.
DURABLE – Bags are Made with Heavy Duty 12 oz Duck Canvas that is Double Stitched for Extra Durability, Our Bags are Tough Enough to be used on Any Playing Surface.

CUSTOM COLORS - If Color Combo is Not Listed Choose our CUSTOM COLORS Option from the Drop Down and Message us the Two Colors you would like. We offer 20 Solid Colors, 4 Camo Patterns, and our Popular Stars and Stripes Design.
MADE IN THE USA – Our Bags are 100% Manufactured in the United States!
1 YEAR WARRANTY – We will Replace Our Cornhole Bags in the case of Stitching Failure for One Year.
